app_card.about_alert_description: Section below is written fully in English, sorry for the inconvenience~

reward_table.title: Reward table
reward_table.endgame_rewards: Endgame rewards (stars from least to most, currently all the same)

results.title: Estimated results
results.stellar_jades: Stellar jades amount gained: {{gained}}, total stellar jades: {{total}}
results.limited_passes: Limited passes amount gained: {{gained}}, total limited passes: {{total}}
results.number_of_pulls: <bold>Number of pulls:</bold> ({{stellarJadesTotal}} jades ÷ {{stellarJadesPerPull}} jades/pull = {{jadesPulls}} pulls from jades) + {{limitedPassesTotal}} limited passes = <bold>{{pullsTotal}}</bold>

assumption_array: Dailies are fully claimed every day, it will be counted assuming you've claimed today's
Simulated/Divergent Universe Points Rewards is fully claimed every Monday
Battle pass is reset every patch, which is usually 42 days
Battle pass passes are all claimed (why would you buy if you can't get them all?)
Endgame content (MOC, PF, AS) resets every 42 days, following their respective schedules

Endgame content is cleared ASAP, and the current endgame content event is counted as done. Meaning let's say the period you are calculating has 4 MoC occurrences, it will only count the rewards from those 3 and not the current happening one
Passes from Embers Exchange reset 1st of every month, and all 5 is bought every month

label.embers_exchange_five_passes: Buy 5 passes from Embers Exchange monthly

tooltip.battle_pass_type: Nameless Glory gives {{namelessGloryJades}} jades; Nameless Medal gives {{namelessMedalJades}} jades. Both give {{limitedPass}} limited pass
tooltip.point_rewards: From Simulated/Divergent Universe (Equilibrium level affects amount given)
tooltip.embers_exchange_five_passes: Assuming 5 exchanged every 1st of month when it refreshes (excluding this month)
tooltip.additional_sources: Allows you to add any jade/pass sources custom-ly (like events, code redemption, compensations, HoYoLAB check-in, and more)
tooltip.end_date: Treat as exclusive, as today isn't counted
